tests.name: Unauthenticated API Access Protection
tests.description: Verify API endpoints reject unauthenticated requests
tests.details: API returned status 401 for unauthenticated request

tests.name: Session Security Implementation
tests.description: Verify session security manager is properly implemented
tests.details: Session security middleware with HMAC signing and fingerprinting

tests.name: Enhanced JWT Validation
tests.description: Verify enhanced authentication middleware is implemented
tests.details: Enhanced auth middleware with session validation and revocation

tests.name: XSS Prevention in API Input
tests.description: Verify malicious scripts are sanitized in API inputs
tests.details: API properly requires authentication (status: 403)

tests.name: Input Validation Utilities
tests.description: Verify comprehensive input validation utilities exist
tests.details: Comprehensive input sanitization with UUID, email, HTML validation

tests.name: Zod Schema Validation
tests.description: Verify Zod schemas are implemented for input validation
tests.details: Zod validation found in API routes

tests.name: Secure Session Secret Configuration
tests.description: Verify session secrets are properly configured and validated
tests.details: Session secret validation implemented

tests.name: Session Revocation Capability
tests.description: Verify session revocation is implemented for security breaches
tests.details: Session revocation blacklist implemented

tests.name: Security Headers Implementation
tests.description: Verify comprehensive security headers are set
tests.details: Security headers (HSTS, CSP, etc.) implemented

tests.name: File Type Validation
tests.description: Verify file uploads validate type using magic numbers
tests.details: Magic number validation implemented

tests.name: File Size Limits
tests.description: Verify file uploads enforce size limits
tests.details: File size limits implemented

tests.name: Virus Scanning
tests.description: Verify uploaded files are scanned for malware
tests.details: PDF validation and virus scanning implemented

tests.name: Secure File Storage
tests.description: Verify files are stored securely with encryption
tests.details: Encrypted file storage implemented

tests.name: Enhanced Error Handler
tests.description: Verify comprehensive error handling is implemented
tests.details: Circuit breaker and error categorization implemented

tests.name: Process Management
tests.description: Verify graceful shutdown and resource cleanup
tests.details: Process manager with cleanup handlers implemented

tests.name: Health Monitoring
tests.description: Verify system health monitoring endpoints exist
tests.details: Comprehensive health check API implemented

tests.name: Health Check Accessibility
tests.description: Verify health check endpoint is accessible
tests.details: Health check returned status 500

tests.name: Rate Limiting Implementation
tests.description: Verify rate limiting is implemented to prevent abuse
tests.details: Secure rate limiter with cleanup implemented

tests.name: Security Headers Present
tests.description: Verify security headers are set in HTTP responses
tests.details: Security headers found: X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Referrer-Policy

tests.name: Audit Logging
tests.description: Verify comprehensive audit logging is implemented
tests.details: Audit logger for security events implemented

tests.name: Structured Logging
tests.description: Verify structured logging for monitoring and debugging
tests.details: Structured logger implemented

tests.name: SQL Injection Prevention
tests.description: Verify SQL injection prevention measures are in place
tests.details: Parameterized queries and input validation implemented

tests.name: CSRF Protection
tests.description: Verify CSRF token validation is implemented
tests.details: CSRF token validation implemented
